results.name: McKay-Thompson series of class 32e for the Monster group.
comment: Number 4 of the 130 identities listed in Slater 1952. - _Michael Somos_, Aug 21 2015
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
D. Ford, J. McKay and S. P. Norton, More on replicable functions, Commun. Algebra 22, No. 13, 5175-5193 (1994).
J. McKay and A. Sebbar, Fuchsian groups, automorphic functions and Schwarzians, Math. Ann., 318 (2000), 255-275. see page 274.
Lucy Joan Slater, Further Identities of the Rogers-Ramanujan Type, Proc. London Math. Soc., Series 2, vol.s2-54, no.2, pp.147-167, (1952).
Index entries for McKay-Thompson series for Monster simple group
formula: Expansion of q^(1/8) * eta(q) / eta(q^4) in powers of q.
Given g.f. A(x), then B(q) = (A(q^8) / q)^8 satisfies 0 = f(B(q), B(q^2)) where f(u, v) = (v + 16) * (u + 16) * u - v^2. - _Michael Somos_, Jan 09 2005
G.f.: 2 - 2/(1+Q(0)), where Q(k)= 1 - x^(2*k+1) - x^(2*k+1)/(1 + x^(2*k+2) + x^(2*k+2)/Q(k+1)); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, May 02 2013
mathematica: a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ QPochhammer[ x] / QPochhammer[ x^4], {x, 0, n}]; (* _Michael Somos_, Aug 20 2014 *)
a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ QPochhammer[ x, x^2] / QPochhammer[ -x^2, x^2], {x, 0, n}]; (* _Michael Somos_, Aug 20 2014 *)
a[ n_] := With[ {m = InverseEllipticNomeQ @ q}, SeriesCoefficient[ (16 (1 - m)/m)^(1/8), {q, 0, n - 1/8}]]; (* _Michael Somos_, Aug 20 2014 *)
a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ Product[ 1 - x^k, {k, 1, n, 2}] / Product[ 1 + x^k, {k, 2, n, 2}], {x, 0, n}]; (* _Michael Somos_, Aug 20 2014 *)
a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ QHypergeometricPFQ[ {-x}, {-x^2}, x^2, x], {x, 0, n}]; (* _Michael Somos_, Aug 21 2015 *)
a[ n_] := If[ n < 0, 0, SeriesCoefficient[ Sum[ (-1)^k x^k^2 QPochhammer[ -x, x^2, k] / QPochhammer[ x^4, x^4, k], {k, 0, Sqrt@n}], {x, 0, n}]]; (* _Michael Somos_, Aug 21 2015 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = my(A); if( n<0, 0, A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x + A) / eta(x^4 + A), n))};
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Apr 08 2003
